entry.title: Songs
entry.summary:
Charlottesville, VA: "Run" by Snow Patrol Charlotte, NC: "I Can Do Anything" by 3OH!3 Nashville, TN: "Something Like That" by Tim McGraw Memphis, TN: New Orleans, LA: "Wide Awake" by Chris Cornell Austin, TX: Lubbock, TX: Los Alamos, NM: Flagstaff, AZ: "Arizona" by Kings of Leon San Diego, CA: Los Angeles, CA: San Francisco, CA: Redding, CA: Eugene, OR: Portland, OR: Seattle, WA: "Losing A Whole Year" by Third Eye Blind Missoula, MT: Buffalo, WY: "Little Talks" by Of Monsters and Men

Boulder, CO: "Don't Trust Me" by 3OH!3

Des Moines, IA: "Home" by Edward Sharpe and the Magnetic Zeroes

New York City, NY: Morristown, NJ: Washington, DC: "Amazed" by The Offspring
